clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy and the Safety of Dexmedetomidine Sedation on the Pediatric Intensive Unit(PICU) Patients.
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy and the Safety of Dexmedetomidine Sedation on the PICU Patients-A Randomized, Controlled Study.

brief_summary.textblock: To observe the efficacy and safety of dexmedetomidine sedation on the patients admitted to the pediatric intensive care unit after surgery.

primary_outcome.measure: percentage of time at target sedation score
primary_outcome.description: assess the sedation level every 2 min using Ramsay score

primary_outcome.measure: the number of patients requiring the sedation remedy
primary_outcome.description: the number of patients requiring the sedation remedy during the mechanical ventilation

primary_outcome.measure: the dosage of midazolam that need for the sedation remedy
primary_outcome.description: the dosage of midazolam that need for sedation remedy during the mechanical ventilation

secondary_outcome.description: the change of blood pressure at 1 min、10 min、20 min、30 min、1 hours、2 hours、3 hours、4 hours、5 hours、6 hours、12 hours、18 hours、24 hours after the sedation drug used.
the change of heart rate at 1 min、10 min、20 min、30 min、1 hours、2 hours、3 hours、4 hours、5 hours、6 hours、12 hours、18 hours、24 hours after the sedation drug used.
the change of respiratory rate at 1 min、10 min、20 min、30 min、1 hours、2 hours、3 hours、4 hours、5 hours、6 hours、12 hours、18 hours、24 hours after the sedation drug used.
the change of blood oxygen saturation at 1 min、10 min、20 min、30 min、1 hours、2 hours、3 hours、4 hours、5 hours、6 hours、12 hours、18 hours、24 hours after the sedation drug used.
time from beginning of study drug used to extubation
change of blood ALT、AST level at baseline and 24 hours after the sedation drug used.
change of blood Cr、BUN level at baseline and 24 hours after the sedation drug used.

secondary_outcome.measure: the dosage of sedation and analgesia drug
secondary_outcome.description: the total dosage of sedation and analgesia drug during the sedation and analgesia period

secondary_outcome.measure: the number of patients requiring fentanyl analgesia in and after 6 hours from study drug used
the dosage of fentanyl in and after 6 hours from study drug used

arm_group.description: Dexmedetomidine 0.5μg/kg intravenous bump for 15 min，then 0.2～1.4μg/(kg.h) for maintenance of sedation；
Dexmedetomidine 0.25μg/kg intravenous bump for 15 min，then 0.2～1.4μg/(kg.h) for maintenance of sedation；

intervention.description: Dexmedetomidine 0.5μg/kg intravenous bump for 15 min，then 0.2～1.4μg/(kg.h) for maintenance of sedation；
Dexmedetomidine 0.25μg/kg intravenous bump for 15 min，then 0.2～1.4μg/(kg.h) for maintenance of sedation；
Fentanyl 0.5～4 μg/(kg.h) for maintenance of analgesia
Ramsay score for sedation assessment, Facial expression, leg movement, activity, cry, and consolability score (FLACC) for analgesia assessment.
